channel.title: Getting Started on PangPang Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on PangPang Labs

item.title: Android
item.description: Set Permission in AndroidManifest.xml file <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> Import import cn.p2shop.pos.Pos; Init String path; if (android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >=android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP){ path = getNoBackupFilesDir().getAbsolutePath(); } else{ path = getFilesDir().getAbsolutePath(); } Pos.init(path); Call API String result = Pos.call("pp://staging/account/login?tenant=LABS&username=salesman&password=1234"); Setting Download Current(v0.1.4) pos.aar Archived versions click In Project Structure click + select import .JAR/.AAR Package click Next select pos.aar file click Finish click OK and re-open Project Structure select app modules select Dependencies tab click + button select 3.

item.title: iOS
item.description: Swift Import import Pos Init let path = NSSearchPathForDirectoriesInDomains(.libraryDirectory, .userDomainMask, true)[0] P2PosInit(path) Call API let result = P2PosCall("pp://staging/account/login?tenant=LABS&username=salesman&password=1234") Objective-C Import #import <Pos/Pos.h> Init NSString* path = [NSSearchPathForDirectoriesInDomains(NSLibraryDirectory, NSUserDomainMask, YES) objectAtIndex:0]; P2PosInit(path); Call API NSString* result = P2PosCall(@"pp://staging/account/login?tenant=LABS&username=salesman&password=1234"); Setting Download Current(v0.1.4) Pos.framework.zip Archived versions click Project Setting Extract Pos.framework.zip file. Drag and Drop Pos.
